history.narrative: Law 17-157 the “Fire-Standard-Compliant Cigarettes Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-373 which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety and Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 5, 2008, and March 4, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 19, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-330 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-157 became effective on May 13, 2008.
